summary: After tragedy strikes, a grieving father discovers an ancient burial ground behind his home with the power to raise the dead.
cast: Dale Midkiff|Fred Gwynne|Denise Crosby|Brad Greenquist|Michael Lombard|Miko Hughes|Blaze Berdahl|Susan Blommaert|Mara Clark|Kavi Raz|Mary Louise Wilson|Andrew Hubatsek|Liz Davies|Kara Dalke|Matthew August Ferrell|Lisa Stathoplos|Stephen King|Elizabeth Ureneck|Chuck Courtney|Peter Stader|Richard Collier|Chuck Shaw|Dorothy McCabe|Mary R. Hughes|Eleanor Grace Courtemanche|Donnie Greene|Lila Duffy|John David Moore|Beau Berdahl Oliver|Kira Willoughby
title: El cementerio viviente
